uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools
Class MonoShader

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.SimpleShader
        |
        +--uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.MonoShader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shader
public class MonoShader
extends SimpleShader

By far the most straight forward of the shaders, it will shade the whole of a map one color.
Regardless of the value passed to this shader it will always return the same preset colour.

Author:
James Macgill.
